actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 162 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the income tax treatment of living expenses of State legislators.

summary.text: Authorizes State legislators, under the Internal Revenue Code, to elect to treat as his or her home either the place where the legislature meets or the legislative district represented by the member for purposes of declaring trade or business expense deductions.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 162 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the income tax treatment of living expenses of State legislators.
